name: SOKONAUT
description:
This is Sokonaut, a space-station-themed, 3D grid version of the classic 2D game Sokoban, where you push boxes into their place to complete levels. 

(developed in a 5 day monday to friday timeline)

In Sokonaut, you can push boxes in all directions inside the 3D grid, and once you put them into place you also need to get out through the exit.

I wasn't expecting how much time it has taken considering how relatively simple the concept seems, so there are a lot of things that are not in their best shape especially on the polish and player feedback side of things. A notable one is that you can't go upside down (unreal doesn't like it and I prioritised other things over figuring this out).

Nevertheless, I hope you enjoy it!
